Package com.sun.jts.CosTransactions

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MinorCode
    This class simply contains minor code values for standard exceptions thrown by the JTS.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdminUtil
    AdminUtil - Utility class for monitoring and administering jts.
    Configuration
    Provides interaction with the execution environment.
    ControlImpl
    The ControlImpl interface is our implementation of the standard Control interface.
    CurrentImpl
    The CurrentImpl class is our implementation of the standard Current interface.
    CurrentTransaction
    This class manages association of transactions with threads in a process, and associated state/operations.
    DefaultTransactionService
    The DefaultTransactionService is our implementation of the com.sun.CosTransactions.TransactionService class.
    DelegatedRecoveryManager
    This class manages information required for Delegated recovery.
    EventSemaphore
    The EventSemaphore interface provides operations that wait for and post an event semaphore.
    GlobalTID
    This class provides a wrapper for the otid_t class in the org.omg.CosTSInteroperation package to allow us to add operations.
    LogControl
    This class holds the top level information for an instance of the log,
    Messages
    This class provides a ListResourceBundle which contains the message formats for messages produced by the JTS.
    Messages_en_US
    This class provides a ListResourceBundle which contains the message formats for messages produced by the JTS.
    RecoveryManager
    This class manages information required for recovery, and also general state regarding transactions in a process.
    RWLock
    A RWLock provides concurrency control for multiple readers single writer access patterns.
    StaticResource
    The StaticResource interface provides operations that allow an object to be informed about changes in transaction associations with threads.
    TopCoordinator
    The TopCoordinator interface is our implementation of the standard Coordinator interface that is used for top-level transactions.
    XATerminatorImpl
    This is used for transaction completion and crash recovery flows.
